snippet.title: Kiyo Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2466790/Kiyo
Wishlist on Steam and you'll make us happy :)

This is the teaser trailer for our first title: Kiyo, a stealthy 2D pixel art platform-adventure with cutting edge 3D lights and shadows.
All the footage is in-game, but please note that it's still work in progress.
Official website: https://www.pixelrats.com
